categories.title: ElizaOS GitHub Updates: Plugin System Improvements and Bug Fixes

content.text: Recent updates to the ElizaOS repository have focused on enhancing the plugin system and fixing various bugs. Several pull requests improved plugin management, including better installation processes (PR #4177) and enhanced CLI update capabilities with package manager integration (PR #4176). Test coverage for plugin-bootstrap was also added (PR #4173).

Multiple bug fixes were implemented, addressing issues with version tagging when importing plugins dynamically (PR #4183), space action functionality (PR #4182), Twitter interaction (PR #4192), the 'elizaos test' command (PR #4196), and Bun installation for plugin-bootstrap (PR #4194).

Code maintenance changes included switching to camelCase for plugin exports in local-ai (PR #4186), removing import logic from core (PR #4184), implementing gentler handling of dynamic-runtime import errors (PR #4179), and addressing module path issues (PR #4178).

categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Several pull requests have been submitted to the elizaOS/eliza repository, focusing on improvements to plugins, command functionality, and bug fixes:

- PR #4190 by Imsharad adds 100% instrumentation coverage for the Twitter plugin, enhancing its reliability and testability.

- PR #4192 by tcm390 fixes Twitter interaction issues, further improving the Twitter plugin functionality.

- PR #4177 by wtfsayo introduces better plugin installation management, making the plugin system more robust.

- PR #4178 by wtfsayo addresses module path issues, likely resolving dependency and import problems.

- PR #4185 by yungalgo makes 'npm create eliza' and 'npx elizaos create' functionally identical, providing consistency in project creation methods.

- PR #4196 by Samarthsinghal28 fixes issues with the 'elizaos test' command, improving the testing experience.

- PR #4197 by Y4NK33420 makes an initial commit to fix the delete character button, addressing a UI/UX issue.

The elizaos/eliza repository showed significant activity over a two-day period. From April 4-5, 2025, there were 13 new pull requests with 8 being merged, 2 new issues, and 12 active contributors. Activity decreased slightly the following day (April 5-6, 2025) with 6 new pull requests (4 merged), 1 new issue, and 8 active contributors.
sources: From 2025-04-04 to 2025-04-05, elizaos/eliza had 13 new PRs (8 merged), 2 new issues, and 12 active contributors.
From 2025-04-05 to 2025-04-06, elizaos/eliza had 6 new PRs (4 merged), 1 new issues, and 8 active contributors.

categories.title: Twitter Integration Issues in Eliza Project

content.text:
Two issues have been reported in the elizaOS/eliza GitHub repository related to Twitter integration:

1. Issue #4181: Twitter interactions are being fetched, but reactions have not been implemented yet. This means that while the system can retrieve Twitter data, it cannot process or display reaction-based interactions.

2. Issue #4180: Twitter space functionality is not working. This appears to be a separate issue affecting the Twitter spaces feature within the Eliza project.

Both issues were reported by the same user (tcm390) and are currently open in the project's issue tracker.

The provided sources mention 'Top contributors for elizaOS/eliza' but do not provide any specific details about who these contributors are or their contributions to the project. Without additional information, it's not possible to generate a detailed summary about the contributors to the elizaOS/eliza project.
